results.title: [Photoallergy to Neotri and cross reaction to tenoretic--detection by systemic photoprovocation].
results.text_hl: One year later, after the antihypertensive medication had been changed from @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@Adalat@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@) to Teneretic (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlortalidone@@@) the @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases_Eczematous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017443 @@@eczematous photosensitive@@@ reaction recurred.
